item.title: Cheatsheet: Python
item.description: Everytime when I am doing a something by Python (or by something else) I need to use articles about main libraries. Despite that I’ve seen it a lot of times, it just can’t fit in my head. So I wrote this article to get the information quickly. Basically it consist links to russian resources. os.path decorators strings regular expression queue, lock web, asyncio, aiohttp cycles, for, while by value / by path list cycle for list Maybe however I will write own copies of these scratches.
